name: Fishbowl
description:
Get three fishbowls and maybe something will happen!

Controls:
Left & Right Arrows.
Hold Down to Cry.
X to Lick
C to Jump

Special Technique:
Ignite your flammable tears by licking them.
Some blocks can be burned.

Tip:
Restore your health by holding "down" on glowing blood. It is dropped by the harmless innocents and television sets.

Hint:
If you perish, use the trampoline in your cave to quickly retry the level.

Also:
The flying enemies are weak against fire.
~~~~~~~~~~~
Fishbowl was made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 33 Jam.
